protein.general_function: Involved in phosphatidylinositol phosphate kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the phosphorylation of phosphatidylinositol-5- phosphate on the fourth hydroxyl of the myo-inositol ring, to form phosphatidylinositol-4,5-biphosphate

reference.reference_text: Boronenkov IV, Anderson RA: The sequence of phosphatidylinositol-4-phosphate 5-kinase defines a novel family of lipid kinases. J Biol Chem. 1995 Feb 17;270(7):2881-4.
